title: Full Show (Pressure on LeBron vs. Jordan, Is Steph Top 10 All-Time?, Brady vs. Manning, Kyrie Irving's Future)
description:
Baseball fans - listen to Flippin’ Bats w/ Ben Verlander: https://listen.foxaud.io/FlippinBats?sid=undnew
00:00 Has LeBron had to endure more pressure and criticism than Jordan?
25:06 Has Steph Curry solidified himself as a Top 10 NBA player of All Time?
45:17 Tom Brady vs. Peyton Manning
58:59 Kyrie Irving’s future
1:12:00 Skip & Shannon share what Juneteenth means to them
1:26:30 Did Ray Allen’s Game 6 three in 2013 save LeBron’s legacy?
1:35:30 Skip & Shannon’s NBA Team of the Century
1:42:59 Draymond Green
1:50:10 Grizzlies-Warriors rivalry
